chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
l: nat
f2: nat -> nat
f1: nat -> nat
b: nat
a: nat

Goal:
is_cipher_of f1 a -> is_cipher_of f2 b -> a = b <-> (forall i : nat, i < l -> f1 i = f2 i)

Premises:
is_cipher_of = fun (f : nat -> nat) (a : nat) => l + 1 < q /\ (forall i : nat, i < l -> f i < power q 2) /\ a = ∑ l (fun i : nat => f i * power (power (S i) 2) r) : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_cipher_of _%function_scope _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
is_cipher_of_fun : forall (f1 f2 : nat -> nat) (a b : nat), (forall i : nat, i < l -> f1 i = f2 i) -> is_cipher_of f1 a -> is_cipher_of f2 b -> a = b
is_cipher_of_inj : forall (f1 f2 : nat -> nat) (a : nat), is_cipher_of f1 a -> is_cipher_of f2 a -> forall i : nat, i < l -> f1 i = f2 i
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp.power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
nat_meet_powers_neq : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i j a b : nat, i <> j -> a < r -> b < r -> a * power i r ⇣ (b * power j r) = 0
nat_meet_powers_eq : forall q r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i a b : nat, a * power i r ⇣ (b * power i r) = a ⇣ b * power i r
is_cipher_of_0 : forall (f : nat -> nat) (a : nat), l = 0 -> is_cipher_of f a < -> 1 < q /\ a = 0
binary_le_sum_powers : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ≲ g i)
const_u2_meet : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i = power (S i) 2) -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2)))
sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r)
const_u1_meet : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ w < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
meet_sum_powers : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ⇣ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i ⇣ g i * power (e i) r)
NoDup_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, i < length l -> nth_error l i = nth_error l j -> i = j)
Nat.pow_neg_r : forall a b : nat, b < 0 -> a ^ b = 0
NoDup_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, i < length l -> j < length l -> nth i l d = nth j l d -> i = j)
Nat.log2_log2_up_exact : forall a : nat, 0 < a -> Nat.log2 a = Nat.log2_up a < -> (exists b : nat, a = 2 ^ b)
Hu2_w : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2))) ⇣ w = 0
Hu1 : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) = msum nat_join 0 m (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
smono_upto_injective : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> f i = f j -> i = j
sinc_injective : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> f i = f j -> i = j
Nat.log2_up_eq_succ_iff_pow2 : forall a : nat, 0 < a -> Nat.log2_up (S a) = S (Nat.log2_up a) < -> (exists b : nat, a = 2 ^ b)
Nat.log2_eq_succ_iff_pow2 : forall a : nat, 0 < a -> Nat.log2 (S a) = S (Nat.log2 a) < -> (exists b : nat, S a = 2 ^ b)
Nat.log2_up_eq_succ_is_pow2 : forall a : nat, Nat.log2_up (S a) = S (Nat.log2_up a) -> exists b : nat, a = 2 ^ b
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
Nat.log2_eq_succ_is_pow2 : forall a : nat, Nat.log2 (S a) = S (Nat.log2 a) -> exists b : nat, S a = 2 ^ b
double_sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) -> (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 < n -> j2 < i2 < n -> e i1 j1 = e i2 j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r)) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r))
nat_ortho_joins_left : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), m ⇣ msum nat_join 0 n f = 0 < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> m ⇣ f i = 0)
g_full : forall (q m k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> {g : nat -> nat | ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2))) = ∑ (2 * k) (fun i : nat => g i * power i (power (4 * q) 2)) /\ (forall i : nat, g i <= m)}
const_u_square : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u * u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) + ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2)))
nat_ortho_joins : forall (m n : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), msum nat_join 0 m f ⇣ msum nat_join 0 n g = 0 < -> (forall i j : nat, i < m -> j < n -> f i ⇣ g j = 0)
all_ones_joins : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall n w : nat, w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i (power (4 * q) 2))
all_ones_2_joins : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall n w : nat, w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 2 * power i (power (4 * q) 2))
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
nat_double_joins_binary_le : forall (n m : nat) (f : nat -> nat -> nat) (g : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> exists k : nat, k < m /\ f i j ≲ g k) -> msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (f i)) ≲ msum nat_join 0 m g
bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
BinNatDef.N.div_eucl = fun a b : BinNums.N => match a with | BinNums.N0 => (BinNums.N0, BinNums.N0) | BinNums.Npos na => match b with | BinNums.N0 => (BinNums.N0, a) | BinNums.Npos _ => BinNatDef.N.pos_div_eucl na b end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N * BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.div_eucl (_ _)%N_scope
Hg1 : forall (q m k : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) (Hf2 : forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j), ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2))) = ∑ (2 * k) (fun i : nat => 2 * proj1_sig (g_full q f Hf1 Hf2) i * power i (power (4 * q) 2))
nat_joins_binary_le : forall (n m : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> exists j : nat, j < m /\ f i ≲ g j) -> msum nat_join 0 n f ≲ msum nat_join 0 m g
Hg2 : forall (q m k : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) (Hf2 : forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) (i : nat), 2 * proj1_sig (g_full q f Hf1 Hf2) i <= 2 * m
power_mult : forall p a b : nat, power (a * b) p = power a (power b p)

```intros q l f2 b a H1 H2. split.
- intros Ha H3 i H4. apply (is_cipher_of_inj f1 f2 a b). assumption. assumption. assumption.
- intros H5. apply (is_cipher_of_fun f1 f2 a b). assumption. assumption. apply H5.```

original: intros q l f2 b a H1 H2. split. - intros Ha H3 i H4. apply (is_cipher_of_inj f1 f2 a b). auto. auto. auto. - intros H5. apply (is_cipher_of_fun f1 f2 a b). auto. auto. apply H5.
